sentences.sContent: I made some new curtains for the living room.
sentences.sContent_eng: I made some new curtains for the living room.
sentences.sCn: 我给起居室做了新窗帘。

sentences.sContent: That was the extent of our living room decor – we had nothing on the walls, or the other surfaces in the room.
sentences.sContent_eng: That was the extent of our living room decor – we had nothing on the walls, or the other surfaces in the room.
sentences.sCn: 这个小架子，就是我老家起居室的全部装饰了。 除此之外，墙上和任何东西上都是干干净净的。

sentences.sContent: Park said that although he'd only had the plastic tree for two years, he felt it was like "his best friend" and never got tired of seeing it sitting in his living room.
sentences.sContent_eng: Park said that although he'd only had the plastic tree for two years, he felt it was like "his best friend" and never got tired of seeing it sitting in his living room.
sentences.sCn: 帕克先生说，尽管他和这颗塑胶圣诞树在一起生活才两年时间，但是它就像是“一个最好的朋友”一样。 每天它都立在起居室�，帕克从未厌倦它。

trans.tranOther: the main room in a house where people relax, watch television etc
